T02D1977:150a-1: shr'i badzra bhee ra ba s'a dha na no pi ka sam kshipta /
T02D1977:150a-3: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa /
T02D1977:150a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1977:150a-5: dpal ldan gang zhig sngon bsgoms pas //
T02D1977:150a-6: dngos grub myur du thob 'gyur ba'i //
T02D1977:150a-7: rdo rje can la gus btud nas //
T02D1977:150a-8: de yi sgrub thabs cho ga bshad //
T02D1977:150a-9: de la re zhig dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi
T02D1977:150a-10: rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa'i dbang bskur ba phun
T02D1977:150a-11: sum tshogs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan
T02D1977:150a-12: pa'i sngags pas / dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong ba rnams su gnas la /
T02D1977:150a-14: the tshom la sogs pa'i dogs pa bsal nas 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1977:150a-15: de'i cho ga ni 'di yin te /
T02D1977:150a-16: dang po kho nar bdag med pa bsgoms pas nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la /
T02D1977:150a-17: rang gi snying gar yi ge ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du /
T02D1977:150a-18: h'um yongs su gyur ba las byung ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje /
T02D1977:150a-19: de'i dbus su yang h'um kha dog nag po 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba bsams la /
T02D1977:150a-20: de'i snang bas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs te /
T02D1977:150a-21: mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1977:150a-22: de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D1977:150a-23: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1977:150a-24: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1977:150a-25: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1977:150b-0: yongs su bsngo @150b pa rnams byas la //
T02D1977:150b-1: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1977:150b-2: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par
T02D1977:150b-3: dag pa'i stong pa nyid du bsgom zhing de brtan
T02D1977:150b-5: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D1977:150b-6: de ltar stong pa nyid bsgoms nas yi ge yam
T02D1977:150b-7: yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu
T02D1977:150b-8: lta bu kha dog nag po ba dan gyis mtshan
T02D1977:150b-9: pa bsams la / de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1977:150b-10: de'i dbus su h'um yongs su gyur pa las khro bo'i rdo rje /
T02D1977:150b-11: de las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02D1977:150b-12: ra ba dang bla re dang ;
T02D1977:150b-13: gur la sogs pa bsgoms te /
T02D1977:150b-14: thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi dbus su aa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1977:150b-15: de'i dbus su yi ge dh'i: yongs su gyur pa las ral gri /
T02D1977:150b-16: ral gri'i dbus su yi ge dh'i: de dag thams
T02D1977:150b-17: cad yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das 'jam
T02D1977:150b-18: dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sku mdog gser btso ma
T02D1977:150b-19: lta bu zhal gcig phyag gnyis dang ldan pa /
T02D1977:150b-20: phyag g-yas pas shes rab kyi ral gri dpung pa'i thad kar 'dzin pa /
T02D1977:150b-21: g-yon pas glegs bam thugs kar bsnams pa /
T02D1977:150b-22: gzhon nu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1977:150b-23: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa /
T02D1977:150b-24: ral pa dang thor tshugs can no //
T02D1977:150b-25: de'i snying gar yi ge mam yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1977:150b-26: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D1977:150b-29: khro bo la sogs pa thams cad bkug la /
T02D1977:150b-31: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1977:150b-32: rang 'jam dpal gyi gzugs su snang ba dang bcas
T02D1977:150b-33: pa thams cad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thim par
T02D1977:150b-34: gyur te / slar 'od zer cher 'phros pa las
T02D1977:150b-35: dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong du khyab pas 'gro
T02D1977:150b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa bkug ste /
T02D1977:151a-0: yi ge h'um kha dog nag po 'od @151a * //
T02D1977:151a-1: zer sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsams te /
T02D1977:151a-2: de las kyang 'od zer byung bas snga ma bzhin du byas te /
T02D1977:151a-3: slar zhugs pas khro bo'i rdo rje /
T02D1977:151a-4: de las rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs spros pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1977:151a-5: rig pa'i lha mo dang khro bo la sogs pa spros te /
T02D1977:151a-6: nam mkha'i khams gang bar byas nas sems can gyi don byas te /
T02D1977:151a-7: sems can thams cad kyis dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid thob par byas nas slar bsdus te /
T02D1977:151a-8: de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bcom
T02D1977:151a-9: ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1977:151a-11: dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa bsams pa ni //
T02D1977:151a-12: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1977:151a-13: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1977:151a-14: dril bu dar gyi 'phan la sogs //
T02D1977:151a-15: me tog phreng dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1977:151a-16: sgo rnams kyi ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1977:151a-17: sgo khyud kyi ni gnas su yang //
T02D1977:151a-18: zla phyed rdo rje rin chen no //
T02D1977:151a-20: re'u mig brgyad pa 'dra ba la //
T02D1977:151a-21: zhes gsungs pa'i rim pas gzhal yas khang de lta bu'i rnam pa can bsams te /
T02D1977:151a-22: de'i dbus kyi lte ba la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal dgu pa /
T02D1977:151a-23: phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa /
T02D1977:151a-24: zhabs bcu drug dang ldan pa /
T02D1977:151a-25: 'jigs pa rnams kyang 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D1977:151a-26: ha ha zhes bzhad cing lce 'dril ba /
T02D1977:151a-29: mi'i sha dang zhag dang khrag la dgyes pa /
T02D1977:151a-30: thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D1977:151a-31: mi'i rus pa'i phreng ba can /
T02D1977:151a-32: phat ces bya ba'i sgras sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa /
T02D1977:151a-33: phyag dang po gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa gos su bsnams pa /
T02D1977:151a-34: lhag ma rnams la go rims bzhin du gri gug dang /
T02D1977:151a-50: g-yon pa rnams ni ka p'a la dang /
T02D1977:151b-14: zhabs g-yas pa rnams kyis ni ;
T02D1977:151b-23: g-yon pa'i zhabs rnams kyis ni //
T02D1977:151b-31: khrung khrung rnams mnan par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1977:151b-32: zhal dang po ma he'i gdong can nag po /
T02D1977:151b-33: rva g-yas phyogs kyi zhal gsum la /
T02D1977:151b-34: dang po sngon po gnyis pa dmar po /
T02D1977:151b-36: rva g-yon phyogs kyi zhal gsum la dang po dkar po /
T02D1977:151b-39: rva gnyis kyi dbus kyi zhal dmar po khro ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1977:151b-40: steng gi zhal kha dog ser po cung zad khro ba /
T02D1977:151b-42: zur phud lnga dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1977:151b-43: zhal re re zhing yang spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1977:151b-44: phyi rol du ni dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa la /
T02D1977:151b-45: shar phyogs su ni gtum drag ces bya ba'i dur
T02D1977:151b-46: khrod la n'a ga ge sar gyi shing la gnas
T02D1977:151b-47: pa'i lha'i tshogs la sogs pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1977:151b-48: lho phyogs su ni shin tu dgod pa zhes bya
T02D1977:151b-49: ba'i dur khrod la plaksha'i shing la gnas pa'i gshin
T02D1977:151b-50: rje'i sde dpon chen po dgod do //
T02D1977:151b-51: nub phyogs su ni go ra aanta ka ra zhes
T02D1977:151b-52: bya ba'i dur khrod la aa shvadtha la gnas pa'i
T02D1977:151b-53: sprin gyi rgyal po rnams yongs su dgod do //
T02D1977:151b-54: byang phyogs su ni ki li ki la zhes bya
T02D1977:151b-55: ba'i dur khrod la shing pa ta la la gnas
T02D1977:151b-56: pa'i gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can bsam par bya'o //
T02D1977:151b-57: me'i phyogs su ni bi bi sha na zhes bya
T02D1977:151b-58: ba'i dur khrod la shing aa khardzun la gnas pa'i
T02D1977:151b-59: drang srong gi tshogs bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1977:151b-60: bden bral gyi mtshams su ni 'bar ba'i rigs zhes
T02D1977:151b-61: bya ba'i dur khrod la shing pa ta la la
T02D1977:151b-62: gnas pa'i srin po la sogs pa dgod par bya'o
T02D1977:152a-1: su ni dmyal ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1977:152a-2: dur khrod la shing au dumw'a ra la gnas pa'i
T02D1977:152a-3: rlung gi bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dgod par
T02D1977:152a-4: bya'o // dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ni dbyibs can
T02D1977:152a-5: zhes bya ba'i dur khrod la shing aa mra la
T02D1977:152a-6: gnas pa'i yi dags kyi tshogs bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1977:152a-7: gzhan yang dur khrod brgyad na bya sha za ba sna tshogs dang /
T02D1977:152a-8: gcan gzan sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1977:152a-9: mi'i ro sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1977:152a-10: ro langs dang srin po dang 'dre la sogs pa sna tshogs bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1977:152a-11: de ltar dur khrod kyi dbus su chud pa'i gzhal
T02D1977:152a-12: yas khang rdo rje 'jigs byed dang bcas pa skad
T02D1977:152a-14: rang gi snying gar rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas
T02D1977:152a-15: pa'i yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis rang bzhin
T02D1977:152a-16: gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed
T02D1977:152a-18: rin po che la sogs pa'i bum pa phyag gis bsnams pas dbang bskur bas /
T02D1977:152a-19: mi bskyod pa cod pan du bsams te /
T02D1977:152a-20: de nyid slar rang gi lus la zhugs pas snying gar ye shes sems dpa' bsams la /
T02D1977:152a-21: de'i snying gar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1977:152a-22: de ltar rang nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed du bsgoms la /
T02D1977:152a-23: sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1977:152a-28: ya de yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02D1977:152a-29: yakshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya h'um phat phat /
T02D1977:152a-31: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat /
T02D1977:152a-33: aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02D1977:152a-35: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sngags kyi yi
T02D1977:152a-36: ge de rnams las gang yang rung ba bsams te
T02D1977:152a-37: / spro ba dang bsdu ba bya'o //
T02D1977:152a-38: sngags kyi yi ge'i 'od zer las khro bo sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1977:152a-40: 'dre dang srin po la sogs pa dang /
T02D1977:152a-41: shin tu 'jigs su rung ba rnams spros te /
T02D1977:152a-42: bsgrub par bya ba'i sha dang /
T02D1977:152a-44: khrag dang chu ser rnams za zhing 'thung ba dang /
T02D1977:152a-46: de ltar bsgom pa dang bzlas pa las ldang bar 'dod na gtor ma gtang bar bya ste /
T02D1977:152b-1: sha dang nya dang khrag dang sgog pa dang /
T02D1977:152b-2: chang dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'am //
T02D1977:152b-3: yang rgyud las gsungs pa'i sha sa tshogs pas bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1977:152b-5: aom k'a la r'u pa sarba dushta sa tva da
T02D1977:152b-6: ma ka ma h'a bh'u ta aa dhi pa ti
T02D1977:152b-7: ai dam pa lim grihna grihn'a pa ya ma ma
T02D1977:152b-8: sha tr'um m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D1977:152b-9: ces pa ni gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D1977:152b-10: de nas langs pa'i dus su yang rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D1977:152b-11: de ltar rnam par bsdus pa las byung ba'i //
T02D1977:152b-12: dge ba des ni sems can ma lus kun //
T02D1977:152b-13: 'phags pa 'jam dpal khros pa las byung ba'i //
T02D1977:152b-14: rdo rje 'jigs byed de dang 'dra bar shog /
T02D1977:152b-15: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor
